title: Natural Escapes Essential Oil, Aromatherapy, Boost
cleaned_text: Fast delivery Get in as fast as 1 hour It's all local Shop your favorites Direct chat Connect with shoppers [Kitchen Tropical Mango Veggie Smoothie](/rest/v8/product/17535595814) Recent reviews About Details Boost by Natural Escapes is an uplifting blend of citrus oils formulated to promote a happy and joyful mood. Get your day headed in the right direction with Boost! Quality assured. Cruelty free. Ingredients A Blend of Lemongrass Oil (Cymbopogon Flexuosus), Grapefruit Oil (Citrus Paradisi), and Orange Oil (Citrus Sinensis). Directions Use of Natural Escapes: Topical use; massage oil; lotion blend; bath & shower; diffuser; air freshener. Directions: Enjoy the benefits of pure essential oils as aromatherapy, for massage or in your bath. Use 2-8 drops in the diffuser or bath. For massage oil, mix 6-8 drops of essential oil with 1 tbsp olive oil. Store in a cool & dry place. Good for 12 months once opened. Warnings Warning: for external use only. If pregnant, suffering from any medical condition or taking medication, consult your physician before use. Avoid eyes and do not apply to broken or irritated skin. Do not use directly on skin, always dilute properly. Keep out of reach of children.
